title: Volcanic eruptions - people affected worldwide up to 2016
summary: This is a bar chart representing Location and Date in the x axis and Number of victims in the y axis.

The Number of victims is appeared to be the highest at Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) and lowest at Location and Date Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002).
The lowest value at Location and Date Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002) is 7.55x times less than the highest value at Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991).

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of victims for 10 number of Location and Dates.

The Number of victims is appeared to be the highest at Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) and lowest at Location and Date Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002).
The second highest Number of victims is appeared to be the Location and Date Volcano eruption in Ecuador (August 14 2015).
The lowest value at Location and Date Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002) is 7.55x times less than the highest value at Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991).

The Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) has the highest Number of victims, followed by Volcano eruption in Ecuador (August 14 2015), and Volcanic eruption in Nicaragua (April 9 1992). Down to the Location and Date Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002) which is the lowest.
The lowest value 137140.0 at Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002) is almost 2.81 times smaller than the average value 368530.4.
Summing up the values of all Location and Dates, we get total 3685304.0.

data.Location and Date: Volcanic eruption in Papua New Guinea (September 19 1994)
